title: Women's Sexy One Shoulder Backless Maxi Dress Elegant Ruched O Ring Sleeveless Evening Dress Long Gown Cocktail Dress
description: SOFT & COMFY: This women's maxi dress is made of 83% polyester and 17% spandex, soft and comfy touch feeling, it's skin-friendly, no itchy, breathable, comfortable for summer wear.

FEATURES: This sexy maxi dress features one shoulder, sleeveless, backless, floor length, ruched back and metal O ring. Soft and stretchy fabric fits your body perfectly and makes you look sexier than ever.

MULTI-WAY WEARING: This elegant dress features an extra long strap that you can wrap it around your neck and tie a knot, then casually place it on your back. There’re also a metal ring for the back to go through so you can wrap the long strap around your shoulder and waist, finally tie a knot. Alternatively, you can explore other more unique ways of dressing!

OCCASIONS: This stunning maxi dress is perfect for a beach holiday, casual wear, wedding party, cocktail party, night out, ball, evening dinner, banquet, birthday party, wine party, homcoming party, valentines night, concert clothing or other important occasions.
